name: Lilly's Flower Shop
description:
Enjoy this great Match 3 Flower Shop Adventure. Form groups of three or more flowers, gardening stuff and other flower shop items to unlock powerful boosters and help Lilly to realize her dream. Use the right strategy, earn coins and build the most beautiful flower estate in town.



Meet Lilly, an ambitious young woman who had always wanted to run her own flower shop. She now has the change to build a beautiful flower shop from scratch in the countryside where she had so much fun in the summer. Help Lilly to rebuild and grow her Flower Store, become friends with the mysterious biker, help de town to flourish, make lots of new friend and enjoy the summertime full of flowers and plants.



  • 100+ colorful Match 3 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Use 5 unique boosters like Water Sprinklers, Lawnmower, Hedge trimmer, Honey bom, and Flower Power
  • Rebuild the flower shop and use your green thumb to improve the entire neighborhood
